divs: Sighting DetailsAround 10:30 pm on july 3rd was sitting outside talking to my sister on the phone and saw a bright orange orb between some trees and looked like it came from the ground up and move from west to east .scared the crap out of me ...i ran inside to call my son outside all he got was some of it threw another set of trees that it had moved passed then could not see it anymore because of the trees..some crazy stuff..i know for a facted it was no airplane or anything but what i saw..im from illinois..did anyone else see this tonight??
